title: From Amul and Mother Dairy milk, to toll tax, LPG, and more — What’s costlier and cheaper in June - CNBC TV18
selftext: Milk, Instant foods like Dosa batter etc, Higher Toll Taxes,Earlier on June 1, jet fuel or aviation turbine fuel (ATF) price was reduced by a steep 6.5% but no reduction in Fuel prices for the common man.
